title: Dessertify
shortDescription: A  dessert shopping page with seamless cart management.
fullDetails: An interactive dessert shopping experience which includes a cart functionality and a responsive layout for a fun, engaging user experience

title: Waitr Landing Page
shortDescription: A visually appealing intro page for an innovative food service.
fullDetails: A modern food-ordering landing page created using Next.js. Includes responsive design, a functional waitlist pop-up modal, and a user-friendly interface for showcasing Waitr’s features and attracting potential users.

title: MortgagePro
shortDescription: Calculate and visualize mortgage payments for better financial planning
fullDetails: This mortgage calculator allows users to input loan details and calculate monthly payments. The clean design and easy functionality make home financing simple.

title: Dev Finder
shortDescription: Search GitHub users and view profiles with theme toggling.
fullDetails: This React app simplifies GitHub user profile searches. With username-based retrieval, responsive layout, and theme switching, it’s a smooth and visually engaging experience.

title: Virtual Card Pro
shortDescription: Interactive card form with real-time virtual card preview.
fullDetails: A web app that  shows live updates of card information, offering users an interactive experience with a virtual card preview.

title: Tipster
shortDescription: Modern, user-friendly app for calculating and sharing tips instantly
fullDetails: Built to help split bills easily and accurately. Enjoy responsive design and a smooth user experience for hassle-free dining.
